page.shortlink: api a5ws import users dbf function
page.description: Import selected User records from an external table into the current project web security users table
page.discussion: Displays a dialog to import selected user records. The A5WS_ImportUsersDbf() function displays a dialog to import selected user records from an external table into the current project web users table. It is normally called from an option on the web Users and Groups dialog.

see.ref: Displays a dialog to import selected user records
